description: Detects potentially suspicious child processes of "Diskshadow.exe". This could be an attempt to bypass parent/child relationship detection or application whitelisting rules.
name: Potentially Suspicious Child Process Of DiskShadow.EXE
query: (process.executable:(*\\certutil.exe OR *\\cscript.exe OR *\\mshta.exe OR *\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe OR *\\regsvr32.exe OR *\\rundll32.exe OR *\\wscript.exe)) AND process.parent.executable:*\\diskshadow.exe
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: False postitve can occur in cases where admin scripts levreage the "exec" flag to execute applications
